description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useNotes' which manages note-taking functionalities, including loading, creating, updating, deleting, and filtering notes. It interacts with external storage functions and maintains internal state for notes, selection, filtering query, loading status, and errors.

methods.name: useNotes()
methods.description: A custom React hook that provides logic to manage notes, including load, create, update, delete, and filter functionalities.
